After setting up a release and an iteration we can start to implement, test and fix our work product.
To get more information about the status of your Iterations you can use a task board which tells you what requirement is already e.g. in progress, implemented or verified.
  • Open "Iteration 2" and scroll down to Plan Board (you can also use "Plan Board hyperlink on top)
  • You should see both requirements, their sub tasks and defects and also the state of tasks and defects. At the right side of your requirement you should see yourself as assignee and you remaining estimate.

    Hint: Worklfow states of this task board can be customized.
  • Open tasks/defects and change their status. After refreshing your Plan you will see all status changes in your plan board.
  • Add 4d to your time spent attribute of your first requirement and 1d to your second requirement.
    Your Plan board might look like this:
  • Lets say we are finished with our iteration. WeÂ´ve got still 3 days of work open in our second requirment but we will transfer this open requirment to our next iteration. Set the status of your plan to "Done"
Hint: A historical state of your plan will be saved. Even if you move an item into its next iteration you can go back and have a look how your plan looked like when you were finished.
